article: at a time when national republicans are increasingly nervous about the party 's failure to unite behind an opponent to run against hillary rodham clinton in the u.s. senate race from new york next year , gov.
george e. pataki is still refusing to go along with his party 's leaders and support mayor rudolph giuliani over other potential candidates .
abstract: pataki remains noncommittal on a candidate for the senate
